title: Shroomerang
summaries: The Shroomerang is a boomerang found in Gold Chests near a Glowing Mushroom biome and dropped by Spore Bats with a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) chance. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is used to craft the Trimarang.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 60

result.value: [img:Trimarang]Trimarang
